text: Homeland Fighter's Party, also known as Pejuang, is a political party in Malaysia. It was founded by Mahathir Mohamad, a former Prime Minister of Malaysia. The party was established in 2020 after Mahathir and several other politicians left the ruling coalition. Pejuang aims to stop corruption and remove the influence of money in politics. ==References== Category:2020 establishments in Asia Category:21st-century establishments in Malaysia Category:Political parties in Malaysia Category:Mahathir Mohamad
title: Homeland Fighter's Party
